name: Shakir
text: Suad, I swear by the Quran, full of admonition.

name: Shakir
text: Nay! those who disbelieve are in self-exaltation and opposition.

name: Shakir
text: How many did We destroy before them of the generations, then they cried while the time of escaping had passed away.

name: Shakir
text: And they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves, and the disbelievers say: This is an enchanter, a liar.

name: Shakir
text: What! makes he the gods a single Allah? A strange thing is this, to be sure!

name: Shakir
text: And the chief persons of them break forth, saying: Go and steadily adhere to your gods; this is most surely a thing sought after.

name: Shakir
text: We never heard of this in the former faith; this is nothing but a forgery:

name: Shakir
text: Has the reminder been revealed to him from among us? Nay! they are in doubt as to My reminder. Nay! they have not yet tasted My chastisement!

name: Shakir
text: Or is it that they have the treasures of the mercy of your Lord, the Mighty, the great Giver?

name: Shakir
text: Or is it that theirs is the kingdom of the heavens and the earth and what is between them? Then let them ascend by any

name: Shakir
text: A host of deserters of the allies shall be here put to flight.

name: Shakir
text: The people of Nuh and Ad, and Firon, the lord of spikes, rejected (apostles) before them.

name: Shakir
text: And Samood and the people of Lut and the dwellers of the thicket; these were the parties.

name: Shakir
text: There was none of them but called the apostles liars, so just was My retribution.

name: Shakir
text: Nor do these await aught but a single cry, there being no delay in it.

name: Shakir
text: And they say: O our Lord! hasten on to us our portion before the day of reckoning.

name: Shakir
text: Bear patiently what they say, and remember Our servant Dawood, the possessor of power; surely he was frequent in returning (to Allah).

name: Shakir
text: Surely We made the mountains to sing the glory (of Allah) in unison with him at the evening and the sunrise,

name: Shakir
text: And the birds gathered together; all joined in singing with him.

name: Shakir
text: And We strengthened his kingdom and We gave him wisdom and a clear judgment.

name: Shakir
text: And has there come to you the story of the litigants, when they made an entry into the private chamber by ascending over the walls?

name: Shakir
text: When they entered in upon Dawood and he was frightened at them, they said: Fear not; two litigants, of whom one has acted wrongfully towards the other, therefore decide between us with justice, and do not act unjustly, and guide us to the right way.

name: Shakir
text: Surely this is my brother; he has ninety-nine ewes and I have a single ewe; but he said: Make it over to me, and he has prevailed against me in discourse.

name: Shakir
text: He said: Surely he has been unjust to you in demanding your ewe (to add) to his own ewes; and most surely most of the partners act wrongfully towards one another, save those who believe and do good, and very few are they; and Dawood was sure that We had tried him, so he sought the protection of his Lord and he fell down bowing and turned time after time (to Him).

name: Shakir
text: Therefore We rectified for him this, and most surely he had a nearness to Us and an excellent resort.

name: Shakir
text: o Dawood! surely We have made you a ruler in the land; so judge between men with justice and do not follow desire, lest it should lead you astray from the path of Allah; (as for) those who go astray from the path of Allah, they shall surely have a severe punishment because they forgot the day of reckoning.

name: Shakir
text: And We did not create the heaven and the earth and what is between them in vain; that is the opinion of those who disbelieve then woe to those who disbelieve on account of the fire.

name: Shakir
text: Shall We treat those who believe and do good like the mischief-makers in the earth? Or shall We make those who guard (against evil) like the wicked?

name: Shakir
text: (It is) a Book We have revealed to you abounding in good that they may ponder over its verses, and that those endowed with understanding may be mindful.

name: Shakir
text: And We gave to Dawood Sulaiman, most excellent the servant! Surely he was frequent in returning (to Allah).

name: Shakir
text: When there were brought to him in the evening (horses) still when standing, swift when running--

name: Shakir
text: Then he said: Surely I preferred the good things to the remembrance of my Lord-- until the sun set and time for Asr prayer was over, (he said):

name: Shakir
text: Bring them back to me; so he began to slash (their) legs and necks.

name: Shakir
text: And certainly We tried Sulaiman, and We put on his throne a (mere) body, so he turned (to Allah).

name: Shakir
text: He said: My Lord! do Thou forgive me and grant me a kingdom which is not fit for (being inherited by) anyone after me;

name: Shakir
text: Then We made the wind subservient to him; it made his command to run gently wherever he desired,

name: Shakir
text: And the shaitans, every builder and diver,

name: Shakir
text: And others fettered in chains.

name: Shakir
text: This is Our free gift, therefore give freely or withhold, without reckoning.

name: Shakir
text: And most surely he had a nearness to Us and an excellent resort.

name: Shakir
text: And remember Our servant Ayyub, when he called upon his Lord: The Shaitan has afflicted me with toil and torment.

name: Shakir
text: Urge with your foot; here is a cool washing-place and a drink.

name: Shakir
text: And We gave him his family and the like of them with them, as a mercy from Us, and as a reminder to those possessed of understanding.

name: Shakir
text: And take in your hand a green branch and beat her with It and do not break your oath; surely We found him patient; most excellent the servant! Surely he was frequent in returning (to Allah).

name: Shakir
text: And remember Our servants Ibrahim and Ishaq and Yaqoub, men of power and insight.

name: Shakir
text: Surely We purified them by a pure quality, the keeping in mind of the (final) abode.

name: Shakir
text: And most surely they were with Us, of the elect, the best.

name: Shakir
text: And remember Ismail and Al-Yasha and Zulkifl; and they were all of the best.

name: Shakir
text: This is a reminder; and most surely there is an excellent resort for those who guard (against evil),

name: Shakir
text: The gardens of perpetuity, the doors are opened for them.

name: Shakir
text: Reclining therein, calling therein for many fruits and drink.

name: Shakir
text: And with them shall be those restraining their eyes, equals in age.

name: Shakir
text: This is what you are promised for the day of reckoning.

name: Shakir
text: Most surely this is Our sustenance; it shall never come to an end;

name: Shakir
text: This (shall be so); and most surely there is an evil resort for the inordinate ones;

name: Shakir
text: Hell; they shall enter it, so evil is the resting-place.

name: Shakir
text: This (shall be so); so let them taste it, boiling and intensely cold (drink).

name: Shakir
text: And other (punishment) of the same kind-- of various sorts.

name: Shakir
text: This is an army plunging in without consideration along with you; no welcome for them, surely they shall enter fire.

name: Shakir
text: They shall say: Nay! you-- no welcome to you: you did proffer it to us, so evil is the resting-place.

name: Shakir
text: They shall say: Our Lord! whoever prepared it first for us, add Thou to him a double chastisement in the fire.

name: Shakir
text: And they shall say: What is the matter with us that we do not see men whom we used to count among the vicious?

name: Shakir
text: Was it that we (only) took them in scorn, or have our eyes (now) turned aside from them?

name: Shakir
text: That most surely is the truth: the contending one with another of the inmates of the fire.

name: Shakir
text: Say: I am only a warner, and there is no god but Allah, the One, the Subduer (of all):

name: Shakir
text: The Lord of the heavens and the earth and what is between them, the Mighty, the most Forgiving.

name: Shakir
text: Say: It is a message of importance,

name: Shakir
text: (And) you are turning aside from it:

name: Shakir
text: I had no knowledge of the exalted chiefs when they contended:

name: Shakir
text: Naught is revealed to me save that I am a plain warner.

name: Shakir
text: When your Lord said to the angels; Surely I am going to create a mortal from dust:

name: Shakir
text: So when I have made him complete and breathed into him of My spirit, then fall down making obeisance to him.

name: Shakir
text: And the angels did obeisance, all of them,

name: Shakir
text: But not Iblis: he was proud and he was one of the unbelievers.

name: Shakir
text: He said: O Iblis! what prevented you that you should do obeisance to him whom I created with My two hands? Are you proud or are you of the exalted ones?

name: Shakir
text: He said: I am better than he; Thou hast created me of fire, and him Thou didst create of dust.

name: Shakir
text: He said: Then get out of it, for surely you are driven away:

name: Shakir
text: And surely My curse is on you to the day of judgment.

name: Shakir
text: He said: My Lord! then respite me to the day that they are raised.

name: Shakir
text: He said: Surely you are of the respited ones,

name: Shakir
text: Till the period of the time made known.

name: Shakir
text: He said: Then by Thy Might I will surely make them live an evil life, all,

name: Shakir
text: Except Thy servants from among them, the purified ones.

name: Shakir
text: He said: The truth then is and the truth do I speak:

name: Shakir
text: That I will most certainly fill hell with you and with those among them who follow you, all.

name: Shakir
text: Say: I do not ask you for any reward for it; nor am I of those who affect:

name: Shakir
text: It is nothing but a reminder to the nations;

name: Shakir
text: And most certainly you will come to know about it after a time.
